name: mcgill-tools
description: A website that allows McGill students to be notified when a seat for a desired course becomes available

scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client && mv client/build server/build/
scripts.update: npm update --prefix server && npm update --prefix client

author: Hani Damlaj
